remediation_description: Assess governance requirements and align priorities to meet those requirements.
remediation_solution: Form a working group to review current governance policies and requirements. Identify any gaps where existing priorities may not satisfy requirements. Develop a prioritization framework that ensures governance requirements are met while still enabling the business. Communicate new priorities across teams.
remediation_general_considerations: Consider regulatory compliance requirements and involve key stakeholders when setting priorities.
effort_estimate: 2 week effort: 1 week to collect requirements, 1 week to align priorities
